name: ListCandidateClientInfo
description:
Retrieve client info records for a candidate.

Use this tool to list all client information records for a specific candidate. Requires candidatesRead permission.

parameters.name: candidate_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the candidate whose client information is being requested. This should be provided in JSON format.
